### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.

### Gitian builds | File | commit fc0da027e8cda1d7304e50315a848c353bae4822
(master) | commit 65347ca3fb93b86f4137384c8cad9f14c577d964
(master and this pull) | |--|--|--| | bitcoin-0.19.99-aarch64-linux-gnu-debug.tar.gz | [`de8751e92d57e5b2...`](https://drahtbot.space/gitian/bitcoin/bitcoin/fc0da027e8cda1d7304e50315a848c353bae4822/bitcoin-0.19.99-
Concept ACK\n\nWeren't you working on extending `security-check.py` to MacOS as well? It has been shown to be quite important to check these things are actually applied (#17569)

> Weren't you working on extending security-check.py to MacOS as well?\n\nYea I started working on a macOS version here: https://github.com/fanquake/core-review/blob/master/macos_dylib_check.py. I can integrate those changes, as well as extend to check for the bind flags as part of this PR.
> I can integrate those changes, as well as extend to check for the bind flags as part of this PR.\n\nthat'd be awesome!
Concept ACK, would love to see the `macos_dylib_check.py` be in the codebase and as part of reproducible builds (if that makes sense).
Currently on hold as we investigate some discrepancies with the macOS dynamic loader.
The macOS security and dylib checking changes are going to be PR'd shortly, as well as some additional ld flags error checking.
